name: amBlogProject
description: 1. Blog List Page - [ ] This page displays the list of all blog posts in a paginated list view. - [ ] When a user clicks on a list item it opens the blog view page to display the blog content. - [ ] The page have Add New Post action button that open a model to create a new post - [ ] Each post has 3 fields Title, Content, Date. 2. Blog View Page - [ ] This page displays the content of a blog - [ ] It should display the comments on this post in a nested tree. - [ ] The page should have a comment box to add new comments on the post. - [ ] The latest comment should be displayed first at each level. - [ ] Use the design given in the image below to implement the Blog view page.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
